ItemEquip.name: encounter suit
ItemEquip.description: A form fitting full body outfit of alien design. Technological components grant it enhanced active protection abilities. It's made of protective fabrics and metallic armour plated inserts meaning even without the shield active it provides +2 kinetic, +2 thermal defence.

effectStatus.applyText: TARGET actives their encounter suit shield

statusDefence.removeText: TARGET suit shield powers down fades away
